Plot: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul who is funding the development of an international space weapon.
Title: Die Another Day
Writer: Ian Fleming (characters), Neal Purvis, Robert Wade
Actors: Pierce Brosnan, Halle Berry, Toby Stephens, Rosamund Pike
tomatoConsensus: Its action may be bit too over-the-top for some, but Die Another Day is lavishly crafted and succeeds in evoking classic Bond themes from the franchise's earlier installments.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 33 nominations.
Language: German, Korean, Cantonese, English, Icelandic, Italian, Spanish
